1: What new beginnings are you embracing this month?
What intentions are you setting for the year ahead?
How does the fresh start of a new year make you feel?
What habits from last year would you like to leave behind?
What's one area of your life you'd like to transform this year?
2: How can you show more love to yourself this month?
What relationships are you most grateful for right now?
How does the shortest month of the year affect how you think about time?
What passion project would you like to dedicate more energy to?
What's warming your heart during this cold season?
3: What is beginning to emerge or 'spring forth' in your life?
How do you feel as the days grow longer?
What seeds (literal or metaphorical) are you planting this month?
What area of your life needs renewed energy?
How can you balance the changeable energy of this time of year?
4: What brings you a sense of renewal this month?
How do the April showers in your life lead to future growth?
What's something playful you can embrace this month?
How are you adapting to the changes around you?
What dormant part of yourself is ready to bloom?
5: How can you find more joy in this beautiful month?
What abundance are you witnessing in your life?
How are you honoring the growth you're experiencing?
What does the fullness of spring teach you about your own life?
How can you bring more color and vibrancy into your daily experience?
6: As we reach the year's midpoint, how are you progressing with your intentions?
What areas of your life feel most in balance right now?
How are you celebrating the light and warmth of this season?
What adventures are calling to you this month?
How can you maximize the energy of the longest days of the year?
7: What gives you a sense of freedom in your life?
How do you plan to savor the heart of summer?
What simple pleasures are you enjoying most right now?
How does the heat of summer affect your energy and mood?
What playful activities bring out your inner child?
8: What has been your greatest joy this summer?
As summer begins to wind down, what are you most grateful for from this season?
What adventures did you have or wish you had this summer?
How are you preparing for the transition into a new season?
What habits or activities would you like to maintain as the seasons change?
9: What are you harvesting from the seeds you've planted earlier this year?
How do you feel about the balance of giving and receiving in your life?
As routines return, what structures support you best?
What lessons has this year taught you so far?
How can you maintain a sense of ease while moving into a busier season?
10: What are you ready to release as the leaves fall?
How does the changing landscape reflect changes in your own life?
What comfort practices help you embrace the growing darkness?
What aspects of your life feel most colorful right now?
How are you preparing yourself for the more introspective season ahead?
11: What practices or traditions help you cultivate gratitude?
As the year begins to close, what accomplishments are you most proud of?
How do you stay connected to your inner light as the days grow shorter?
What are you gathering close as the world grows colder?
How can you practice generosity in meaningful ways this month?
12: How do you honor endings and transitions in your life?
What gifts (literal or metaphorical) have you received this year?
What lights up your heart during this darkest time of year?
How have you grown or transformed over the past twelve months?
What hopes are you carrying into the new year?

winter: How does the quiet of winter speak to you?
What inner work feels most important during this introspective season?
How do you find coziness and comfort during the coldest months?
What lies dormant within you, preparing to emerge in a new season?
How can you honor the natural rhythm of rest that winter brings?
spring: What's awakening within you this spring?
How are you welcoming the return of color and light?
What aspects of yourself are ready to blossom?
How does the energy of spring inspire your creativity?
What new beginnings are you embracing this season?
summer: How are you embracing the expansiveness of summer?
What brings you alive during this vibrant season?
How does the abundance of sunlight affect your energy and mood?
What adventure is summer calling you toward?
How can you savor the fullness of this season?
fall: What are you harvesting from the seeds you've planted this year?
What wisdom comes with the cooling temperatures and earlier sunsets?

What comforts help you transition into the more introspective seasons?
How does autumn's transformation mirror changes in your own life?
